docs.abstract: Survey on achievements in science during last decade notes that much of biology's view of chemistry of life was transformed in early 70's by advent of recombinant DNA technology; diagram of replicating mechanism of DNA (S)

docs.lead_paragraph: The dazzling achievements of science during the past decade covered a field as broad as the universe, as tiny as an electron and as complex as human life. Merely to report the ...
